Title: Blue's Backyard Ballgame Bonanza
Plot: Steve is all dressed-up in t-shirt and sport pants as we head out for Blue's Backyard Ballgame Bonanza. It's a fun-filled event containing all sorts of different ballgames. We help out our friends with the games by acting as a coach and telling them how they can make the balls do the things they want. We also have fun with Steve's invisi-ball and later skidoo into a stadium where we assist Steve in making sense of an obstacle course filled with ball challenges.
GuestStars: Marissa Chin, Anthony Claus, Patrick Cooney, Shannon Cooney, Alexis Lambres, Emily Poole
